page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: {Kenton family It is very difficult to select one family as each family does something different. Our selected family has two children at our school. They have lived in Kenton about ten years. The father's work takes him all over the South West and Kenton is close to the motorways and main roads which helps him to go about his work. The mother is a nurse and is the local midwife for the district. She delivers babies in Kenton and three other villages. Both adults said "we wanted to live in a village and be part of it so we moved to Kenton."All the family belong to local clubs.They all say they enjoy living here.
